name: 2024 8th International Conference on Nanomaterials and Biomaterials
content: Publication: Accepted papers with proper registration and presentation will be published in the below journals of Scientific.Net collection. Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. ☆☆Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) (ISSN print 1012-0386/ISSN web 1662-9507) ☆☆Solid State Phenomena (SSP) (ISSN print 1012-0394/ISSN web 1662-9779) ☆☆Materials Science Forum (MSF) ISSN print 0255-5476/ISSN web 1662-9752) ☆☆Key Engineering Materials (KEM) (ISSN print 1013-9826/ISSN web 1662-9795)
